info.name: CAA Record
author: pdteam
info.description: A CAA record was discovered. A CAA record is used to specify which certificate authorities (CAs) are allowed to issue certificates for a domain.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 33687
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;www.fr.label2020.eu.	IN	 CAA
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 33687
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 1, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;www.fr.label2020.eu.	IN	 CAA

;; AUTHORITY SECTION:
label2020.eu.	3600	IN	SOA	ns.udag.de. hostmaster.united-domains.de. 2023012714 10800 3600 604800 3600

request:
GET /typo3/ HTTP/1.1
Host: www.fr.label2020.eu
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip

info.name: Missing Subresource Integrity
author: lucky0x0d
pulsesecurity.co.nz
info.description: Checks if script tags within the HTML response have Subresource Integrity implemented via the integrity attribute

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: www.fr.label2020.eu
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK Connection: close Access-Control-Allow-Origin: * Cache-Control: max-age=0 Content-Language: en Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8 Date: Fri, 05 Jan 2024 00:34:49 GMT Expires: Fri, 05 Jan 2024 00:34:49 GMT Server: Apache/2.4.25 (Debian) Vary: User-Agent,Accept-Encoding X-Ua-Compatible: IE=Edge,chrome=1 France | Label 2020

info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: www.fr.label2020.eu
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip

_=<script>alert(1)</script>
response:
HTTP/1.1 301 Moved Permanently
Connection: close
Content-Length: 0
Access-Control-Allow-Origin: *
Cache-Control: max-age=0
Content-Type: text/html; charset=UTF-8
Date: Fri, 05 Jan 2024 00:34:58 GMT
Expires: Fri, 05 Jan 2024 00:34:58 GMT
Location: https://fr.label2020.eu
Server: Apache/2.4.25 (Debian)
Vary: User-Agent
X-Ua-Compatible: IE=Edge,chrome=1
curl-command: curl -X 'POST' -d '_=<script>alert(1)</script>' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' -H 'Host: www.fr.label2020.eu' -H 'User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)' 'https://www.fr.label2020.eu/'

info.name: Detect SSL Certificate Issuer
author: lingtren
info.description: Extract the issuer's organization from the target's certificate. Issuers are entities which sign and distribute certificates.

info.name: SSL DNS Names
author: pdteam
info.description: Extract the Subject Alternative Name (SAN) from the target's certificate. SAN facilitates the usage of additional hostnames with the same certificate.

info.name: TLS Version - Detect
author: pdteam
pussycat0x
info.description:
TLS version detection is a security process used to determine the version of the Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol used by a computer or server.
It is important to detect the TLS version in order to ensure secure communication between two computers or servers.

info.name: TLS Version - Detect
author: pdteam
pussycat0x
